live_updates: Technicians are on stand-by for remaining areas that are still not getting power. We thank you for your patience during this extended outage.
We continue to await restoration of hydro power to be restored in the affected areas. Once hydro is restored our services will begin to come online.
We await restoration of hydro power to our equipment serving the affected areas.
Technicians continue to wait for the local power company to complete their repairs. Once power is back online our technicians will resume restoring services.

Technicians continue to work to restore service as quickly possible. However, due to the nature of the repairs involved, we cannot give an ETA at this time. We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
Technicians have identified the source of the issue but are unable to proceed with work due to safety concerns in the area. Work will continue throughout the day.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
53131.summary: Some customers in Jasper are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
53131.title: Sept 7 - Jasper | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Our technicians continue to repair services through the night. We apologize for the extended disruption and thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.

53186.title: Sep 6 - Atikokan | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
